meanings.definition: A form of poetry consisting of rhyming couplets and a refrain.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading ghazals in her literature class.
meanings.sent2: The poet's latest book is filled with beautiful ghazals.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled as they tried to write their own silly ghazals.
meanings.sent4: Her words danced on the page like ghazals in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The haunting melodies of the ghazals stayed with her long after she read them.

meanings.sent1: He treasured his grandmother's old ghazals.
meanings.sent2: The library had a special section dedicated to ghazals.
meanings.sent3: The family gathered around to read the treasured ghazals together.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with the sweet scent of old ghazals.
meanings.sent5: The book club discussed the different themes present in the collection of ghazals.
